QAData.question: Who won between Brighton & Hove Albion and West Ham United on Sun, 22 May 2022 15:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Brighton & Hove Albion won 3–1 over West Ham United on Sun, 22 May 2022 15:00:00 GMT.
